entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
